bedroom.name: Master Bedroom
bedroom.description: You are in the Master Bedroom that feels worn-out, the air is quiet and a bit musty.

bat.name: Wooden Bat
bat.description: Wooden BAT leaning against the wall
bat.lookAtDescription: You look at it closer... yup it's a bat alright

carkey.name: Car Key
carkey.lookAtDescription: You look at the keys, you see a faded GM symbol on it
You look at the keys, you see a faded GM symbol on it

bed.name: Bed
bed.description: an old, creaky BED that has seen better days
bed.lookAtDescription: You look at the bed and see a body shaped indent along with bugs everywhere.... the thought of you sleeping there gives you the shivers

dresser.name: Dresser
dresser.description: A DRESSER sitting in the corner with chipped paint and worn-out handles.

livingroom.name: Living Room
livingroom.description: You find yourself in the living room, a less-than-pleasant sight with faded wallpaper peeling off and untouched dust that likely hasn't been disturbed in years.

couch.name: Couch
couch.description: A dusty old COUCH with a bunch of holes and stains

tv.name: TV Stand
tv.description: A dilapidated TV stand holding an ancient television

rug.name: Rug
rug.description: A worn, RUG with faded intricate patterns sprawls across the creaky wooden floor

library.name: Library
library.description: The library, a place where learning can occur, I wonder if there is anything that I could learn here

books.name: Books
books.lookAtDescription: Taking a closer look, you see one book that looks out of place

bookshelf.name: Bookshelf
bookshelf.description: One creaky wooden BOOKSHELF, full of books

desk.name: Desk
desk.description: Your standard DESK, used for reading and writing.

chair.name: Chair
chair.description: In the corner there is one comfy looking CHAIR that is used for reading
